description.value: Allows the referencing of Asserter within Basic.PersonalRelationship.

purpose.value: This is a use case from TBD to backport the R6 functionality of the new Profile PersonalRelationship

short.value: Who has asserted the details of the relationship

definition.value: The asserter of the relationship. Typically is the source of the relationship information. (The relationship was reported by ...).
